description: When you order this dish in a restaurant, you usually get a Caesar salad topped with dry slices of chicken breast Here, the moist shreds are bathed in the dressing with the lettuce â€” another story altogether.
title: Chicken Caesar Salad
title_page: Chicken Caesar Salad Recipe - NYT Cooking
text: : To make garlic croutons, lightly toast slices of French or country bread. Remove them from the toaster, and immediately rub with a cut clove of garlic. Cut into small squares, or break into pieces. To coddle the egg yolk, bring a small pot of water to a boil, slowly add the egg in its shell, and cook for three minutes. Transfer to a bowl of ice water, then carefully crack the egg and remove the yolk.
